original: [54] tataś cānanda-viśiṣṭeṣu visṛṣṭeṣu śiṣṭeṣu rāma-kṛṣṇau nija-nija-dhāma samāgamya
analyzed: tatas ca ānanda viśiṣṭeṣu visṛṣṭeṣu śiṣṭeṣu rāma kṛṣṇau nija nija dhāma samāgamya

original: ramyatama-śayyām adhiśayya mātṛbhyām upacaryamāṇau paricārakaiḥ paricaryamāṇau sukhaṃ nidadratuḥ /

analyzed: atha snigdha kaṇṭhaḥ samāpana digdham tat idam vākyam sa añjali vyānañja
īdṛśaḥ tanayaḥ jātaḥ tava gopa dharā pate

atha śrī dāma ādi camatkāra sāra prada prathanasya tat etad kathanasya śravaṇa ante
sā eva iyam līlā iti bhrānte

original: tata eva bahir vṛttita upaśānte goloka-dharitrī-kānte jane ca śreṇī-prānte,
analyzed: tatas eva bahis vṛttitaḥ upaśānte goloka dharitrī kānte jane ca śreṇī prānte

original: tau sūta-sutau yathāvad baddhāñjalitayāvasthitau cirata eva pūrva-pūrvavat prīti-dānena vāsaṃ prasthāpitau vidhāya te sarve yathāsvam āvāsādikam  #
analyzed: tau sūta sutau yathāvat baddhāñjali tayā avasthitau ciratas eva pūrva pūrvavat prīti dānena vāsam prasthāpitau vidhāya te sarve yathāsvam āvāsa ādikam
āsāditavantaḥ
iti śrī śrī gopālacampūm anu
gocāraṇapracāraṇam nāma
dvādaśam pūraṇam
atha trayodaśam pūraṇam

original: [1] atha pratiprātar iva śrīmad-vrajarāja-samāje virājamāne kathāṃ kathayituṃ samutkaṇṭho madhukaṇṭho nijāntaś cintayāmāsa-
analyzed: atha pratiprātar iva śrīmat vrajarāja samāje virājamāne kathām kathayitum samutkaṇṭhaḥ madhukaṇṭhaḥ nija antaḥ cintayāmāsa

original: [2] dhenu-cāraṇārambha-lambhaka-dine dhenukālambhaḥ khalu śrī-bādarāyaṇinā tadīya-cāraṇāvasara-sāmyānusāriṇā pūrvam eva varṇitaḥ /

analyzed: vastutas tu paugaṇḍa prānte eva paṇḍayā nirṇītaḥ

original: ataḥ śrī-parāśareṇāpi kāliya-damanānantar-āvasara eva so' yaṃ sāvasaraḥ kṛtaḥ /

original: damite sarparāje tu kṛṣṇena yamunā-hrade [2.13.1] ity uktvā dhenuka-vadhaḥ samārabdhaḥ /

original: tasmāt kāliya-damanam eva prathamaṃ prathayiṣyāmaḥ iti /

analyzed: pratyāpta bahula sukha sahacara tayā varṇanam eva asmābhiḥ ākarṇanīyam eva ca yuṣmābhiḥ

original: [5] tad evam arjunīṣu paryāg eva cirāya cāryamāṇāsu pari kāliyālaya-jalāśayāśayam eva calituṃ khalu śrī-balarāmaḥ samanujñāṃ kalayāñcakre,

original: śrī-balāvarajasya tu tasya cirata evāvirataṃ tad didṛkṣā na kṣīṇāsīt /

original: janmata eva durjana-tejasām asahanatāyām avikalena tejasvitā-balena ca /

original: [7] tad evaṃ sthite sadāvad eva kadāpi kṛṣṇāgra-janmanaḥ śravaṇākhyaṃ māsikaṃ

original: tadā ca saṅkarṣaṇaḥ sa khalu harṣaṇa-maṅgala-snapanādy-āsaṅgataḥ sva-gṛha eva saṅgata āsīt /

original: [8] tadā ca kāsāñcanābhinavānāṃ gavām atipratyāsanna-prasavānām avaśyam eva svāvanīyatayā vināpi taṃ vanīm anugata-sakhaḥ śrīdāma-sakhaḥ prasthitavān
analyzed: tadā ca kāsāñcana abhinavānām gavām ati pratyāsanna prasavānām avaśyam eva sva avanīya tayā vinā api tam vanīm anugata sakhaḥ śrīdāma sakhaḥ prasthitavān

analyzed: kintu sambhojana samaya samayane samayam vidhāya tadā ca labdhe vipralabdheḥ avasare

original: pūrvam evāyaṃ śrī-yuta-kṛṣṇaḥ pārāvāra-bhaviṣṇu-sthāsnu-cariṣṇu-duḥkha-dāna-dhṛṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇādhiṣṇyasya kāliyasya nirākariṣṇu-tṛṣṇo' pi,

original: yebhyas tu prāṇā jagat-prāṇāśana-bhayataḥ sadya eva vipratipadyeva svayam utpatantaḥ kadāpi na nyavartanta /

original: so' yaṃ punar garutmat-kṛtāmṛta-seka eka eva kāla-kuṭa-jvālayāpi kṛtālambaḥ kadambaḥ sulalita-dalāditayā lālasīti /

original: tasmād asyopariga-koṭara-piṭhare sphuṭaṃ tad anavadyam amṛtam adyāpi vidyata iti prasahyāham āruhya paśyāni /

original: bhavantas tu gāḥ kiñcid dūracaratayā cārayantaś carantu /

original: [20] tad etad vadan vigata-kadanaḥ kañja-vadanaḥ kadambam adhiruhya parikaraṃ samūhya,

original: svayaṃ kiraṇa-gaṇāmṛta-ghanāghanaḥ sānnidhya-mātra-nirmita-sādharmye tasmin kāliya-harmye nirmala-jala-krīḍā-kutukāya papāta-
analyzed: svayam kiraṇa gaṇa amṛta ghanāghanaḥ sānnidhya mātra nirmita sādharmye tasmin kāliya harmye nirmala jala krīḍā kutukāya papāta

original: [21] yatra ca tatra sarpa-hrada-gata-jalaṃ dhanuḥ-śatam udasarpat /

original: tac ca śrī-vrajarāja-tapaḥ-pratāpa-phalasya saṅkhyātīta-balasya tasya na citram ity eva mantavyam,
analyzed: tat ca śrī vrajarāja tapaḥ pratāpa phalasya saṅkhyā atīta balasya tasya na citram iti eva mantavyam

original: yena hi paugaṇḍatayā nātipracaṇḍam api tad eva tad-vapuś caṇḍāṃśu-koṭivad atīvoddaṇḍatayā tatra kuṇḍalīnāṃ bhāti sma /
analyzed: yena hi paugaṇḍa tayā na ati pracaṇḍam api tat eva tad vapuḥ caṇḍa aṃśu koṭi vat atīva uddaṇḍa tayā tatra kuṇḍalīnām bhāti sma
tatas ca tasya amara vāraṇa vāraṇa vikrama krama tayā ghūrṇat bhuja āpūrṇa vār ghoṣaṇa saṅgharṣaṇayā

original: svayaṃ krīḍā-harṣataḥ smitaṃ varṣantaṃ pītāṃśuka-vidyudbharaṃ kara-caraṇādhara-rohitākaraṃ
